title: Qualy
author: Qualy
content: Hi, I have a company that sells visa gift cards for crypto and we deliver world wide. Would anyone be interested in making a purchase?

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: If the cards don't require KYC, can be used everywhere online, and are also cheap, I'm pretty sure you'll find demand for it.

comments.author: Qualy
comments.body: I charge 10% for the card. So if it is $100 USD I charge $110 in Eth. Is that a fair amount?

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: You should move (bottom left) this to Goods.Quote from: Qualy on June 11, 2022, 08:06:06 AMI have a companyYou should add your company name and location (to say the least).Quotethat sells visa gift cards for crypto and we deliver world wide. Would anyone be interested in making a purchase?I would love to have an anonymous Visa card funded by Bitcoin, but I'd never order it by post.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: It's a good initiative, but don't you have a website for selling these cards automatically?

comments.author: maikrotha1337
comments.body: I need one 10$ card how much you will charge for itdo you accept middlemen?

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: maikrotha1337 on July 05, 2022, 10:49:17 AMI need one 10$ card how much you will charge for itdo you accept middlemen?The user has not logged in since then so don't expect them to respond quickly.Selling these cards requires making sure that they are from a registered company (Visa will not allow this) so either they will be closed in the near future or they are hacked/stolen (It was illegally obtained)escrow will not protect you with such services.

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: Quote from: maikrotha1337 on July 05, 2022, 10:49:17 AMI need one 10$ card how much you will charge for itdo you accept middlemen?You didn't mention if you're willing to verify your identity or not, but if you are, then you can always check the cards Coinsbee offers[1][2].[1] https://www.coinsbee.com/en/My%2BPrepaid%2BCenter%2BVISA-bitcoin[2] https://www.coinsbee.com/en/My%2BPrepaid%2BCenter%2BMastercard-bitcoin

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on July 06, 2022, 10:42:58 AMYou didn't mention if you're willing to verify your identity or not, but if you are, then you can always check the cards Coinsbee offers[1][2].Are these cards really worth buying? I remember that they were buying from a service that service has become not working in many sites, and most sites are now rejecting such cards? Was this problem resolved or the supplier changed?I think the name was digitalbank or something like that

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on July 06, 2022, 02:36:14 PMAre these cards really worth buying? I remember that they were buying from a service that service has become not working in many sites, and most sites are now rejecting such cards? Was this problem resolved or the supplier changed?I think the name was digitalbank or something like thatYes, that was an old supplier which didn't request KYC but had a lot of problems[1]. The one I linked is a different one (My prepaid center) which they added a few months ago. I'm not sure if they're worth buying though.[1] https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.prepaiddigitalsolutions.com
